attributes.action: Bring back the head lice nurse to our schools
attributes.additional_details:
Petition to bring back the nit nurse in ALL Primary School's.
The amount of time's I have heard people say "They should bring back the nit nurse" I thought it would be an idea to create a petition for this, especially after my own experience of clearing my Children of them, only for them to go back to School and be re-infected with them. I understand that all Children get lice and it is easy treated but unfortunately there are Parent's who don't have the time to do so or cant be bothered.
I would like the government to bring back the good, old fashioned 'Nit Nurse'.
